description: This is the main CLI script for a project initializer tool. It handles command-line argument parsing, project configuration creation, and interacts with templates to initialize various project types with specific configurations. The script also provides help messages, example usage, and integrates with a template factory to generate initialization info and output success or failure messages.

classes.name: ProjectConfig
classes.description: Represents the configuration settings for the project to be initialized, including name, version, description, author, type, output path, and parameters.

classes.name: ProjectType
classes.description: Handles the project type enumeration and provides the from_string method to parse string into enum.

classes.name: TemplateInitInfo
classes.description: Contains the initialization instructions and environment settings for the project template.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] parse_parameters(params_str: str)
methods.description: Parses a comma-separated string of key=value pairs into a dictionary with appropriate types (bool, int, float, str).

methods.name: ProjectConfig create_project_config(args)
methods.description: Generates a ProjectConfig object from CLI arguments.

methods.name: str make_path_absolute(path: str, base_path: Path)
methods.description: Converts a relative path to an absolute path based on the project directory.

methods.name: dict template_init_info_to_dict(init_info: TemplateInitInfo, project_path: Path)
methods.description: Converts a TemplateInitInfo object into a dictionary with absolute paths for use in JSON output.

methods.name: output_json(success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_path: Path = None)
methods.description: Prints a formatted JSON result indicating success or failure, including message and template configuration.

methods.name: main()
methods.description: Entry point for executing command-line argument parsing, project initialization, and outputting results.

ctags.name: output_json
ctags.pattern: /^def output_json(success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_pat/
ctags.signature: (success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_path: Path = None)
